extendedInfo.description: "doubleTwist Alarm Clock has to be by far the most stunning of all time-watching apps on the market. In fact it is so good that I would consider switching to Android just for this app, for it is not available on iOS." - Om Malik, GigaomGently awaken to your favorite medley. Or violently rouse yourself from deep slumber with death metal. The choice is yours!Alarm Clock Features:â¢ Two clock modes: flip clock and analog clock, includes nightstand dim mode.â¢ Set alarm through one of four modes: Time, Sleep Cycle, Quick Nap, or  Sunrise. Sleep Cycle helps pick optimal wake-up times to correspond with sleep cycles.â¢ Set multiple alarms.â¢ Set recurring alarms (weekdays, weekends, etc).â¢ Set a custom label for your alarms.â¢ Choose from built-in alarm sounds and ringtones or wake up to your favorite song or playlist (requires free doubleTwist Player app).â¢ Set adjustable fade in time for alarm volume.â¢ View time pending until next scheduled alarm.â¢ Set snooze duration and alarm volume.â¢ Swiss Clock live wallpaper.doubleTwist Alarm Clock is handmade with â¤ in San Francisco.If you have comments or feedback on our app, or need additional support, please visit http://doubletwist.com/contact/. Thanks! Use of this app is subject to the doubleTwist Terms of Use and Privacy Policy: http://doubletwist.com/legal/

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Ability to set title alarms and with a random or selected song is great. Also the ease of use fits my needs really well.
reviews.author: Vernon Edwards

reviews.title: Excellent App & 5*
reviews.comment: Excellent work. I love it and use it daily. It would be great to have this awesome analog clock in various widgets sizes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Okay. But after installing timely alarm clock. I think this app is like black and white colour TV.  Also timely has many options which twist doesn\'t have. Guys you need to pull up your sleeves and get something new features.
reviews.author: rahim samnani

reviews.title: Love it... Perfect
reviews.comment: Asked for a different way to Snooze /cancel alarm and got it! Great app and my only alarm clock.   Thanks to the great developer! Perfect
reviews.author: Tom Goodwin

reviews.title: Beautiful smooth
reviews.comment: Beautiful smooth smooth app but I just wish there would be a surround sound option in audio settings somewhere...
reviews.author: Andrew Reimer

reviews.title: Excellent. Usability failure
reviews.comment: Usability issue. Why don\'t you sort the alarm based on time? I Have set up several alarms. Whenever I want to activate one I have to literally go through every alarm time, search, and turn it on. If this list is sorted it will make easy to understand implicitly where to find.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Great app! Just been having a few issues with my saved alarms being deleted? Is only happened recently though, perfect otherwise!
reviews.author: Pragati Moghe

reviews.title: Best Alarm/Clock App
reviews.comment: Id love to see more apps from doubleTwist!
reviews.author: Riley Lewand

reviews.comment: Excellent app! You can sync music from double twist player and set any of your music to wake up to and also set any of your music as ringtones! Double twist is everything you need all in one! Genius!
reviews.author: Jesse Williams

reviews.title: Nice, just nice
reviews.comment: Original suggested \"sleep time\" and good nap timer, but else outside of a good UI it doesn\'t bring that much.
reviews.author: Werner Beroux

reviews.title: Outstanding
reviews.comment: The fantastic features of this app and ease of use make this app stand far out amongst alternatives, but it would be nice to be able to use your own music without installing the media player separately.
reviews.author: Sam King

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: This is a truly beautiful app and I love the dim light mode for night time by my bed. Excellent job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: The new version of the app fixes the one big problem it had. Now it\'s an excellent alarm clock!
reviews.author: Adam Thayer

reviews.title: Great alarm
reviews.comment: Hasn\'t failed me yet. Plenty of options. What else is there to say?
reviews.author: John Garcia

reviews.title: Difficult to dismiss after latest update.
reviews.comment: Hate the new mechanism, slide to dismiss.  Difficult to tap the slide area without bringing down the android notifications bar instead.  Then you have to slide the damnable thing all the way down the screen.  Very clunky method.  Should have left the old mechanism as an option in settings.  Looking for a new alarm clock app.
reviews.author: Bill Connelly

reviews.title: App getting worst
reviews.comment: Since last update I am having trouble waking up on time. The alarm will just stop after a certain time and it will stay as a notification on the notification bar stating tap to dismiss alarm. But most of the time I am already late. And is anyone having battery draining issues with this? Phone was at 90% before sleeping. Woke up to like 34 % was wondering if this app is causing it
reviews.author: Joon Kiat Ong

reviews.title: Late for work....
reviews.comment: Unreliable at the worst times. Use this long enough and it will let you down.
reviews.author: Jonathan McElroy

reviews.comment: This is an awesome app.  So many options, so many different alarms you can set.  I could never go back to the stock/HTC alarm again.
reviews.author: Jason Martin

reviews.title: Excellent alarm app
reviews.comment: Great app, I use it instead of the stock one. The sleep cycle thing is awesome. One thing though - the snooze button is located right above the home button and sometimes I miss hit the home button.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good solid app!
reviews.comment: Would be nice to be able to set radio station\'s as wake up sound, also colour change options for the clocks etc!  I Would also like to see the time  until alarm status bar when in dimmed bedside clock mode & you should be able to change the time frame it silences the phone before an alarm from the standard 8hrs!  HTC1X+
reviews.author: A Google User
